Class HDBOfficerDAO

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.Model.DAO.HDBOfficerDAO
public class HDBOfficerDAO extends Object
DAO (Data Access Object) class responsible for managing data related to HDB Officers.

Provides functionality to load, retrieve, verify, and persist officer information stored in a CSV file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HDBOfficerDAO()
    Constructs an HDBOfficerDAO and initializes the list of officers by loading from the CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      public List<HDBOfficer> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves the full list of HDB officers.
      Returns:
      a list of HDBOfficer objects

    • NRIC_exist

      public boolean NRIC_exist(String NRIC)
      Checks whether an officer with the given NRIC exists.
      Parameters:
      NRIC - the NRIC to check
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC exists, false otherwise

    • getPasswordOfUser

      public String getPasswordOfUser(String NRIC)
      Retrieves the password of a specific officer by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      NRIC - the NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      the password as a String, or null if not found

    • getUser

      public HDBOfficer getUser(String NRIC)
      Retrieves a specific HDB officer by NRIC.
      Parameters:
      NRIC - the NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      the matching HDBOfficer object, or null if not found

    • updateDB

      public boolean updateDB()
      Writes all current officer data in memory back to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • officerNametoNRIC

      public String officerNametoNRIC(String officerName)
      Retrieves the NRIC of an officer given their name.

      Mainly used for associating officers with enquiries.

      Parameters:
      officerName - the name of the officer
      Returns:
      the NRIC of the officer, or null if not found
